title: The Bunnyhop, Episode 1: Lizzy Banks and Ruth Winder
content:
We’ve been watching the rollout of the Bunnyhop over on Instagram over the last few weeks, and the first episode dropped today. What is it? It’s a brand new monthly cycling show that takes a fresh look at the women’s pro peloton – yet another excellent way to keep up with the sport.

Presented by Rebecca Charlton along with Rose Manley and Molly Weaver, the show brings you race highlights, analysis and original rider features.

Check out their first episode above.

The post The Bunnyhop, Episode 1: Lizzy Banks and Ruth Winder appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: Caley Fretz
